column4: I don't know how! but my php doesn't seem to be working. is there setting for apache to use php or not?
are you sure you have all the right packages installed?
you need afew more packages installed for php to work with apache...
hmm, just a sec, i'll check which ones i had installed. never used that lamp one
sorry to bother again, but now I have php -version working.
ok, create test.php file with <?php phpinfo(); ?>  in it and put it in /var/www/
does apache work right tho? can you serve pages?
look if you have the files php4.conf and php4.load under /etc/apache2/mods-enabled/
ok, can you create a file called that? i'll paste you the content in PM
